post.content:
We are in the age of technological advancement and artificial intelligence is one of the fastest growing development in the field of technology and innovation. Artificial intelligence basically means intelligence of machines. The ability of computer systems or machines to operate and process data like a human being is called Artificial Intelligence. Personal assistant like Apple Iâ€™ Phones siri , Google assistant , Alexa are creation of Artificial Intelligence. Artificial intelligence is revolutionizing many areas likes education , finance etc. In future AI will bring more smarter and efficient machines to make our lives easier and better. Autonomous vehicle will be on roads very soon. A lot of research and development is going in that field. Amazon is working on faster delivery through drones with the help of AI which can respond to human gestures as well. Dominos is also working on autonomous vehicles for fast pizza delivery which can take orders from the customers directly. AI will surely make some jobs obsolete. Eminent scientist Stephen Hawking warned us that artificial intelligence could lead to the end of human race. Elon Musk , CEO if SpaceX also fears that artificial intelligence could be our biggest threat.
 
 
Artificial intelligence has shown great significance in material science in recent years only strengthens the idea. Accurate predictions of phase diagrams, crystal structure and material properties are some domains of material science where there has been a significant application of AI in recent times. A combination of experiments and computer simulations has contributed towards exploring materials design more economically.  The introduction of various computational methods in materials science, such as the density functional theory (DFT), Monte Carlo simulations, and molecular dynamics, enabled researchers to explore the phase and composition space more efficiently than ever.
Experts also believe that AI in future will be able to make human life much easier by providing a solution to almost all challenges. AI has a great importance in healthcare. Different companies are trying to develop different quick diagnosis technology with the help of AI. In business sector, AI can save a lot of time and effort. Robotic Automation can be used to complete business task. In various other field as well, the contribution of AI is huge. Hence it is clear that AI is all set to be the future of the entire world.
